div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1036 Poti environs, Georgia, 1910 (830) Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: "several pounds" AR Colchis: didr., (as NNM 130, 2 ["several"], 3 [5 or 6] hemidr. ["several pounds"]) Disposition: Tiflis (part, merged with main coll.); New York 1 Pakhomov, Neskol'ko slov o proiskhozhdenii risunka 'Kolkhidok' (Batum, 1911), p. 7 â€ Pakhomov I, 9 Zograph, "Nakhodky," 35 Pochitonov, NListy 1959, no. 3/4, pp. 65-6 Lang, ANSMN 12 (1966), p. 224 (illus. ANS coin)
